official_title: Director of the NYU Shanghai ECNU Joint Research Institute, Affiliated Silver Professor of Mathematics, NYU Shanghai; Silver Professor of Mathematics, Global Network Professor, FAS, NYU
bio:
Charles Newman is Silver Professor of Mathematics at the Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences at New York University. He holds a PhD and an MA from Princeton University and two BS degrees from MIT.

Newman is a Fellow of the American Mathematical Society, a Fellow of the Institute of Mathematical Statistics, a member of the International Association of Mathematical Physicists, a member of the US National Academy of Sciences, a member of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences, and a member of the Brazilian Academy of Sciences.
